abilities.title: Wookiee Loyalty
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, each character in this Unit may Toward an allied Primary character. If, at the end of this movement, this character is within 3 of the chosen character, that character gains and each character in this Unit may . It's not wise to upset a Wookiee Choose an enemy Unit within 3 and in LOS. Roll 5 Attack Dice. The chosen Unit suffers for each [crit] and [hit] result in the roll. Bodyguard Allied Primary characters within 2 and allied Secondary characters within 2 of a character in this Unit gain Cover [1] . Intimidating Presence While this Unit is not Wounded, allied Rebel Alliance characters within 2 add [expertise] to their defense rolls.

abilities.title: Primary
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, each character in this Unit may Toward an allied  character. If, at the end of this movement, this character is within 3 of the chosen character, that character gains and each character in this Unit may .

abilities.title: Rebel Alliance
abilities.text: While this Unit is not Wounded, allied  characters within 2 add [expertise] to their defense rolls.
